memberdef.name: ns_pdm_default
memberdef.initializer: = { .clock = NS_CLKSEL_HFRC, .clock_freq = NS_AUDIO_PDM_CLK_750KHZ, .mic = NS_AUDIO_PDM_MICBOARD_0, .numBytes = NS_AUDIO_PDM_SAMPLE_16BIT, .left_gain = AM_HAL_PDM_GAIN_0DB, .right_gain = AM_HAL_PDM_GAIN_0DB, }

briefdescription.para: AUDADC subsystem init - should only be invoked by ns_audio, not directly.
Driver for Ambiq PDM Microphone interface.
